original_title: Dino De Laurentiis: The Last Movie Mogul
overview: Documentary about legendary Italian producer Dino De Laurentiis who's credits range from Fellini's La Strada to today's Hannibal franchise. This profile follows octogenarian De Laurentiis in Hollywood and returning to Rome to set up a new film.
title: Dino De Laurentiis: The Last Movie Mogul
